page.description: A tab pane control is used to group controls together on a tab in a Tab control.

item.name: Tab label
item.description: Specify the title for the tab.

item.name: Pane Width
item.description: Optional. Width of the tab pane. (Note: If blank setting in the parent Tab Control will be used.)

item.name: Pane Height
item.description: Optional. Height of the tab pane. (Note: If blank setting in the parent Tab Control will be used.)

item.name: Show pane
item.description: Whether or not the tab should be shown initially.

item.name: Disable pane
item.description: Whether or not the tab should be disabled initially.

item.name: Show/hide expression
item.description: If the expression is true then the tab pane button is shown, otherwise it is hidden. The expression is evaluated in the Browser using Javascript.

item.name: Enable expression
item.description: If the expression is true then the tab pane is enabled, otherwise it is disabled. The expression is evaluated in the Browser using Javascript.
